full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION (RFI) - Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden, ON
## Notice of Request for Information
This is not a solicitation for bids. The Department of National Defence (DND) invites responses to a Request for Information (RFI) for potential future interest in supporting its activities at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden. 

The purpose of this RFI is to confirm availability of housing units for acquisition and/or to determine interest in constructing and/or managing residential housing. DND is seeking to acquire up to 120 housing units within the geographic boundary identified in Annex A. Undeveloped land is also available for consideration, as detailed in Annex B.

## Description of the Program and Services
The Department of National Defence invites interested parties to submit responses to this Request for Information. The purpose of this RFI is to inform and support potential future bidding opportunities, including contract scope, should the initiative proceed.

The information collected as part of this RFI will be used internally by DND and will not be distributed. Firms considering themselves qualified to provide these services are invited to submit their responses to the RFI by email on or before the closing date.

## Instructions for Participation
Please download from MERX the documents included with this Request for Information (RFI) for the list of questions we are seeking responses to. Submission requirements are listed within the RFI document. This is conditional on approval of the project by the Department of National Defence.

## Contact Information
For any questions or clarification related to this Request for Information, please contact:

* Steve Kennedy, Technical Specialist, Procurement, Defence Construction Canada
* Email: [Steve.Kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Steve.Kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613-769-2659

## Important Considerations
* This RFI is a non-committal consultation, under Duty-to-Consult, outlining potential Crown conduct at the early stages of project development.
* The procurement process for the goods and services described in this RFI will not necessarily follow this request.
* No expenses incurred in responding to this RFI will be reimbursed.
* This RFI will not result in the creation of any source list; therefore, whether or not a supplier responds to this RFI will not preclude that supplier from participating in any future procurement opportunities.

Bid submissions are to be sent to email: [Steve.Kennedy@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Steve.K
